description: Dr. Christopher Green, author of the famous "Toddler taming" and "Babies", is a leading authority on Attention Deficit Disorder. This program, designed for parents, teachers and healthcare professionals, investigates key issues about the disorder. It examines ADHD in the under 5's, school age children, and adults, as well as covering diagnosis, behaviour techniques, alternative treatment and medication.
